events.title: Great Moon Hoax Published
events.description: The 'Great Moon Hoax' was published in The Sun newspaper, falsely claiming discovery of life on the Moon.
events.significance: This hoax generated massive public interest in astronomy and highlighted the influence of media in shaping public perception.

events.significance: Marked a milestone in the development of electric aviation technology, paving the way for future innovations.

events.title: Thurgood Marshall Sworn In as First African American Supreme Court Justice
events.description: Thurgood Marshall was sworn in as an Associate Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court.
events.significance: A historic moment for civil rights and justice in the United States, breaking racial barriers in the highest court.

events.title: Kuwait is Liberated from Iraqi Occupation
events.description: Kuwaiti forces and coalition troops declared the liberation of Kuwait during the Gulf War.
events.significance: Marked the end of the Gulf War combat phase and restoration of Kuwaiti sovereignty.
